channel.title: CVE Feed for MicroWorld Technologies Inc. -- eScan Anti-Virus for Linux
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MicroWorld Technologies Inc. -- eScan Anti-Virus for Linux

item.title: CVE-2021-26624|2024-08-03T20:26:25.561Z -- microworld%20technologies%20inc. -- escan%20anti-virus%20for%20linux
item.description: An local privilege escalation vulnerability due to a "runasroot" command in eScan Anti-Virus. This vulnerability is due to invalid arguments and insufficient execution conditions related to "runasroot" command. This vulnerability can induce remote attackers to exploit root privileges by manipulating parameter values.
